users.list.name: List Users
users.list.desc: Permission to retrieve a list of all users and their information

users.modify.name: Modify Users
users.modify.desc: Permission to modify existing user information

calendar.list.name: List Calendar Events
calendar.list.desc: Permission to retrieve a list of all sign in/out events

event.trigger.name: Trigger signin/out events
event.trigger.desc: This permission should only be granted to the raspberry pi user
